title: A Rock with a Ruler (very dangerous)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Measure someone. You will know how many letters the name of their role has.
- Draw a straight line over two people adjacent to each other on the player list. If one dies, the other will be dealt a Basic attack. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Can use multiple abilities, but may only use each ability once per night.
